Board.CheckmateException - Class in <Unnamed>
A CheckmateException does not indicate an error, but rather is used to signal to the containing ChessPanel that a checkmate has occurred and needs to be handled.
Board.CheckmateException(boolean) - Constructor for class Board.CheckmateException
Constructor for the CheckmateException.

A ChessException is any chess game-related exception.

Board.IllegalMoveException - Class in <Unnamed>
An IllegalMoveException is thrown whenever a move is illegal, for example moving a pawn three squares forward.

Board.NeedToPromotePawnException - Class in <Unnamed>
A NeedToPromotePawnException does not indicate an error, but rather is used to signal the containing ChessPanel that a promotion needs to occur.

A Stalemate Exception does not indicate an error, but rather is used to signal the containing ChessPanel that a stalemate has occurred.
